{"rule":"DT_JJ_NO_NOUN","sentence":"^\\QThe final evaluation is conducted for measuring usability to see if the value has increased since the initial evaluation</li> </ol> <p class=\"font-bold\">User Identification</p> <p>The first thing that I need to do is interview the stakeholders of this app, who can provide me with deep information about the purpose of Livin' by Mandiri development, the most used features in the app, and the number of registered users.</p> <p>There are two key insight that came out of the interview:</p> <ul class=\"list-disc list-inside space-y-2\"> <li>Most Used Feature</li> <ol class=\"pl-4 mt-2 space-y-1 list-decimal list-outside\"> <li>Transfer</li> <li>Top-up</li> <li>Bayar</li> <li>e-money</li> <li>Quick Pick</li> </ol> <li>Respondent Requirement</li> <ol class=\"pl-4 mt-2 space-y-1 list-decimal list-outside\"> <li>Respondent must be in the age group of 19 - 25 years old (young adult) and 26 - 40 years old (workers)</li> <li>Respondent must be in the group of new user (< 1 month) or passive user (rarely use the app)</li> </ol> <p>To choose the right respondent who meets the requirements, I decided to use Google Forms as a media selection tool and 20 respondents were selected</p> </ul> <p class=\"font-bold\">Task Scenario</p> <p>Creating 5 task scenarios based on the most used features within the app.</p> <div class=\"relative overflow-x-auto rounded-md\"> <table class=\"w-full text-sm text-left bg-[#f6f6f6]\"> <thead class=\"text-xs text-gray-800 uppercase bg-[#f6f6f6]\"> <tr> <th scope=\"col\" class=\"px-6 scope=\"row\" class=\"px-6 py-4 font-medium whitespace-nowrap\">TS01</th> <td class=\"px-6 py-4 \">Make a money transfer to a selected bank account with an amount of Rp.5.000.</td> <!-- <td class=\"px-6 py-4 \">84</td> --> </tr> <tr class=\"bg-white border-b\"> <th scope=\"row\" class=\"px-6 py-4 font-medium whitespace-nowrap\">TS02</th> <td class=\"px-6 py-4\">Top up the balance of an e-wallet account with an amount of Rp.20.000.</td> </tr> <tr class=\"bg-white border-b\"> <th scope=\"row\" class=\"px-6 py-4 font-medium whitespace-nowrap\">TS03</th> <td class=\"px-6 py-4\">Create a favorite transaction from the latest e-wallet top-up with an amount of Rp 20.000.</td> </tr> <tr class=\"bg-white border-b\"> <th scope=\"row\" class=\"px-6 py-4 font-medium
